entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
